  I'm a graduate student of Univeristy of Technology & Science in 
China. I=
 have recently installed Cantera as a substitute for Chemkin II 
in certain=
 aspects.  
  The Cantera installer I downloaded is "Cantera160r3.msi". The=
 demo 
files works well with Python and Matlab,but the efforts of compiling=
 
demo file for C++ in VC6 always end in vain. It seems that it's 
incompat=
ible with VC6. Which kind of compiler should I use as a typical 
C++ compil=
er compatible with Cantera? Or if there's any measure I can 
take to solve =
the incompatible problem in VC environment?
  Thanks in advance.
